style: font-size: 14px;color: #926814;background-color: #FFF183;left: 80px;top: 20px;width: 80px;height: 39px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
自分らしく好きで
あり続けるのは
大変なことよ
style: font-size: 14px;color: #926814;background-color: #FFF183;left: 20px;top: 85px;width: 121px;height: 58px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
それでいいのよ。
だって皆も
君と同じ様に
頑張ってるから
style: font-size: 14px;color: #926814;background-color: #FFF183;left: 25px;top: 360px;width: 159px;height: 120px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
それって…
驚くほど
深いね
style: font-size: 14px;color: #378002;background-color: #BAFF83;left: 320px;top: 165px;width: 91px;height: 67px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

font-size: 14px;color: #926814;background-color: #FFF183;left: 452px;top: 35px;width: 52px;height: 23px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

font-size: 14px;color: #780084;background-color: #ECB7FC;left: 420px;top: 280px;width: 75px;height: 58px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
少し話をして
彼女がセーラーヌーンの
コスプレした時の写真を
見せてもらったわ
